TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SoapHeaderException extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException

summary.span: 服务器错误的 SOAP 表示形式。

span.span: The SOAP representation of a server error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web 服务客户端将 SOAP 标头中添加到 XML Web 服务方法调用与属性设置为`true`，XML Web service 方法必须设置属性`true`; 否则为引发。When an XML Web service client adds a SOAP header to an XML Web service method call with the property set to `true`, the XML Web service method must set the property to `true`; otherwise, a is thrown. 属性不能设置的 SOAP 规范根据。The property cannot be set according to the SOAP specification for a . > [!NOTE] > 使用 SOAP 1.1 规范，因为可以使用的服务协议的应用程序到访问 SOAP 错误。Applications that use the SOAP 1.1 specification as the service protocol can use the to access SOAP faults. 但是，使用 SOAP 1.2 规范的应用程序必须使用到访问 SOAP 错误。However, applications that use the SOAP 1.2 specification must use the to access SOAP faults. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，XML Web 服务客户端调用`MyWebMethod`类型的 SOAP 标头中传递的 XML Web 服务方法`MyHeader`与属性设置为`true`。In the following example, an XML Web service client calls the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method, passing in a SOAP header of type `MyHeader` with the property set to `true`. 如果 XML Web service 方法不会设置属性`MyHeader`到 SOAP 标头`true`、引发。If the XML Web service method does not set the property of the `MyHeader` SOAP header to `true`, a is thrown. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
